short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that replaces Charts or Discover on Roblox back to Games or another name!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Very simple extension that can replace "Charts" or "Discover" on the Roblox website with "Games" or an another name. [To change it to Games, open the extension settings by clicking the extension icon in the top right. Then, replace Discover with Games.]

Source code of this project is available on GitHub: https://github.com/EfazDev/efazdev-cdn/tree/main/cdn/extensions/charts-rename-remover/chromeExtension
